title: NURF Mode?

embed.description: The PBE has been updated! Omega Squad Teemo's unique R mushroom has been added, as well as a mysterious NURF tooltip, updates to the April Fools' skins splash art, tentative Fizz changes, and more! Continue reading for more information! ( Warning: PBE Content is tentative and iterative - what you see may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers!

body:
Seeing this, its probably a joke but i'm interested to see what you guys think. Myself I think its a joke and probably won't happen as it will be april 1st, some people think its a feature in URF mode as the 'Change' Riot mentions in the department of last years URF mode.

Quoting Riot Pabro:

>  "-Ultra Rapid Fire will come back in one form or another-"

Quoting Surrender@20:

> "Files for what appears to be a mysterious new "NURF" mode have popped up in today's patch...
> 
> Here's the tool tip for NURF's "Strategic Buff of Strategistic Strategery":
> "+100% Mana and Energy consumption
> +200% Cooldown Inflation on Abilities, Activated Items, and Summoner Spells
> +50% Anti-Tenacity
> +225 Movement Speed Reduction
> +200% Delay between basic attacks
> Critical strikes deal 50% of total attack damage
> This unit deals critical strikes on 150% of its attacks
> Protection against superfluous decisiveness
> This unit is vulnerable to consequences
> Source: Look Before You Leap"

replies.body: hopefully nurf is released. punishment for people spamming "bring urf back it was so goood!!!!"
Yes! And I'll be there enjoying it! (hopefully)
Its (N)URF mode its a random debuff transferring from player to player when they die 1 on each team, every1 else gets the URF buffs

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rallzjZ9,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-03-28T13:08:13.913+0000)
>
> Its (N)URF mode its a random debuff transferring from player to player when they die 1 on each team, every1 else gets the URF buffs

I'm convinced it's negative urf, because it decreases all the things the urf buff increased.
No. I mean you have 5 people in your team. 4 of them have the URF buff, but one person on each team receives the NURF debuff, it was supposed to be random.

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rallzjZ9,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2015-03-29T01:58:57.266+0000)
>
> No. I mean you have 5 people in your team. 4 of them have the URF buff, but one person on each team receives the NURF debuff, it was supposed to be random.

I know what you meant, and I was saying what I think it's going to be.

It's kinda a joke... but still it would will be a game mode. 

"+225 Movement Speed Reduction
This unit deals critical strikes on **150%** of its attacks"

haha

They might have urf mode out for like April fools (after all thats what April fools is all about surprising and fooling everyone) but like on april 2nd urf might be out instead of nurf or as well as  nurf
It might be a joke because this might be the only way they can try to reveal URF mode and have it be a surprise.

You seem to be missing this:
> For the past year, you've reminded us over and over (and over) of **something we once released**. You bombarded everything from Twitter to telegraphs and overwhelmed computer repair shops with shattered caps lock keys.
Source: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/skin-preview/youre-cordially-invited-soiree

But it's likely that they'll have URF back, whether it's slightly different or "NURF", on "March 32nd" otherwise they're going to get lots and lots (and lots) of hate and probably a strong decrease in profits and we all know Rito doesn't want that.
